caption.title: Surveillance of pneumonia cases associated with M. pneumoniae infection in Japan.
caption.p: Weekly cases of pneumonia caused by M. pneumoniae in Japan from April 1999 to present. The graphs are based on the data of the National Epidemiological Surveillance of Infectious Diseases (NESID). (A) Nation average is based on the report from about 500 sentinels. (B) The data of Osaka is based on the report from about 7 to 17 sentinels depending on the year. Also see S1 Table for detail. The latest data are available from the website of the National Institute of Infectious Diseases ( https://www.niid.go.jp/niid/ja/idwr.html).
